description: This file defines a React custom hook named useCanvasScaler, which applies a scaling transformation to a specified container element to adapt a fixed-width design canvas to the viewport size. It manages scaling upon window resize and orientation changes, ensuring the wrapper height adjusts to match the scaled canvas height.

methods.name: useCanvasScaler({ designWidth = 1523, containerId = 'scale-container', canvasId = 'root-frame', } = {})
methods.description: A React hook that applies a scale transform to an element to fit a fixed-width design canvas inside the viewport, maintaining wrapper height alignment.
